card.name: Sinuous Bat
card.text: Flying, lifelink When Sinuous Bat dies, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Hinterland Trapper
card.text: When Hinterland Trapper enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {2}, Sacrifice a Food: Hinterland Trapper gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Arm and a Leg
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Spleen Harvester
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Spleen Harvester. {2}, Sacrifice another creature: Create a Food token. If that creature had mana value 2 or greater, create two of those tokens instead. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Edible Effigy
card.text: When Edible Effigy enters the battlefield, create two Food tokens. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {3}{G}: Put three +1/+1 counters on another target noncreature permanent you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Gourmand Strombo
card.text: When Strombo enters the battlefield, create a Food token for each creature card in your graveyard. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {T}, Sacrifice a Food and a non-Food permanent: Search your library for a permanent card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Cloud Nomad
card.text: Vigilance When Cloud Nomad enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Bauble Smuggler
card.text: Flying When Bauble Smuggler enters the battlefield, draw a card. Bauble Smuggler can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Peregrinate
card.text: Exile target permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. You gain 4 life.

card.name: Curio Sphinx
card.text: Flying When Curio Sphinx enters the battlefield, draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.

card.name: Sump Gumpie
card.text: When Sump Gumpie enters the battlefield, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Star-Crossed Lovers
card.text: Whenever you cast a permanent spell, you may exile target permanent that shares a card type with it, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Freed from the Real
card.text: Enchant creature {U}: Tap enchanted creature. {U}: Untap enchanted creature.

card.name: Quelling Tethers
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't block. {2}{B}: Destroy enchanted creature.

card.name: Sable Seer
card.text: When Sable Seer enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. If you control an Aura attached to a permanent an opponent controls, you may put any number of those cards into your graveyard instead.

card.name: Spitebound Twins
card.text: Flying, deathtouch When Spitebound Twins enters the battlefield, you may gain control of target permanent an opponent controls enchanted by an Aura you control.

card.name: Gloom Slayer
card.text: Flash When Gloom Slayer enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If that creature is enchanted, destroy it instead.

card.name: Kikiro of the Golden Loch
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library, then reveal a card from among them. If it's an Aura card, you may put it onto the battlefield attached to a creature an opponent controls. If you don't, put it into your hand.

card.name: What Remains to be Seen
card.text: When What Remains to be Seen enters the battlefield, create a blue Aura enchantment token named Mirror attached to target creature an opponent controls. The token has enchant creature and "At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature." {3}, {T}: Attach target Aura enchanting a permanent to another permanent with the same controller.

card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

card.name: Magmatic Awakening

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Queva, the Eternal Ash

card.text: Migratory Lambeodon and creatures you control with mounts can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Zane, the Underdog

card.name: Pangolichen
card.text: Pangolichen can't be blocked by more than one creature. {2}{G}: Pangolichen gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Weald Trappers
card.text: You may cast Weald Trappers from the battlefield. {2}{G}: Put a survival counter on Weald Trappers. It has base power and toughness 1/1 and gains hexproof.

card.name: Bees
card.text: Bees deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Protect the Hive
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell. If that spell targets you or a permanent you control, draw a card.

card.name: Fangs of the Swarm
card.text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. If it's attacking, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Mephitic Sodmoth
card.text: {T}: Mephitic Sodmoth deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Chitinous Herd
card.text: Trample Menagerie — Whenever Chitinous Herd attacks, if there are five or more creature types among creatures you control, other creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Dwarven Phalanx
card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. That creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Titan of Cracked Earth
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with haste. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step. Whenever an Elemental you control dies, Titan of Cracked Earth deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Bustling Barkeep
card.text: When Bustling Barkeep enters the battlefield, target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Mince Meat
card.text: Destroy target creature with toughness 3 or less.

card.name: Rise Up
card.text: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If it's legendary, it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Seasoned Connoisseur
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a Food, draw a card.

card.name: Allegiant Meathead
card.text: Defender Whenever Allegiant Meathead is dealt damage by a source an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Allegiant Meathead. Allegiant Meathead can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as it has two or more +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Helke the Bodysnatcher
card.text: When Helke enters the battlefield, put target creature an opponent controls into its owner's library third from the top. Helke becomes a copy of that creature, except it's still legendary and it gains "Whenever a creature with the same name as this creature enters the battlefield, return this creature to its owner's hand."

card.name: Slumyard Ouphe
card.text: When Slumyard Ouphe enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Show of Fortitude
card.text: Choose target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its toughness to the other.

card.name: Lorren, Anxious Duchess
card.text: Lorren is a 4/4 black Demon with flying as long as you control no other creatures.

card.name: Jitter
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Bone-Laden Mindflayer
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of target opponent's library. You lose life equal to that card's mana value. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it.

card.name: Elusive Halfback
card.text: {2}{R}: Target creature can't block Elusive Halfback this turn.

card.name: Frontier Tracker
card.text: When Frontier Tracker enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Menagerie — You may put that card onto the battlefield instead if there are five or more creature types among creatures you control.

card.name: Edge of Their Seats
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Soaring Cloudkin
card.text: Flying When Soaring Cloudkin enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Brink of the Grave
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

card.name: Stud Dealer
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5, note that number if you haven't yet. When you note the fifth number for Stud Dealer, discard your hand, then draw five cards.

card.name: Forum Brawler
card.text: {4}{G}{G}: Put two +1/+1 counters on Forum Brawler.

card.name: Skyline Griffin
card.text: Flying Skyline Griffin has first strike as long as it's attacking.

card.name: Crafty Consultant
card.text: Menagerie — When Crafty Consultant enters the battlefield, if there are five or more creature types among creatures you control, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Avrithe, Wayward Empress
card.text: Flying Menagerie — When Avrithe enters the battlefield, if there are five or more creature types among creatures you control, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Unk, the Punchline
card.text: When Unk enters the battlefield, for each player, Unk fights a creature that player controls of their choice.

card.name: Whooping Raptor
card.text: Flash Whenever Whooping Raptor deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards.

card.name: Syr Kinne SGB
card.text: First strike

card.name: Mirror SGB
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature.

card.name: Bird Spirit SGB
card.text: Flying

card.name: Dragon SGB
card.text: Flying

card.name: Elemental SGB
card.text: Haste

card.name: Dinosaur Beast SGB
card.text: Trample

card.name: Food Golem SGB
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.

card.name: The Savior's Sword SGB
card.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has vigilance and lifelink. Equip {3}

card.name: Food SGB
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Treasure SGB
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.
